msgSnippet: Dear All, I invite you to join JPGroup. JPGroup is a platform for java programmers to help each other and to help promote Java as a language, as a technology,
messageBody:
Dear All,

I invite you to join JPGroup.

JPGroup is a platform for java programmers to help
each other and to help promote Java as a language, as
a technology, as a platform and as a tool for
providing enterprise solutions.

Discussions regarding Java and related technologies
(like object oriented analysis design, open source
projects, XML, software engineering process, software
quality assurance testing) are most welcome.

Check out the links, participate in the polls, inform
your R&D results, contribute to the knowledge base and
most of all communicate your thoughts and ideas to the
fellow developers in the industry and academia.

Opinions and comments on the threads/posts, IT news
and
trends are what the group is looking forward to, from
its valued visitors.

Regards,

Ashik
Moderator of JPGroup
